summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Just Vitality Clinic management system. All core functionality working correctly including the critical bug fix - patients now appear in queue after kiosk registration.

minor_bugs.issue: Expects query parameters instead of JSON body in POST request
minor_bugs.impact: Minor API inconsistency, but functionality works

passed_tests: Launcher page loads with 3 cards (Staff Portal, Analytics, Kiosk)
Kiosk registration flow - Step 1: patient identification works
Kiosk registration flow - Step 2: contact info collection works
Kiosk registration flow - Step 3: medical history and consents work
CRITICAL: Patient appears in queue after kiosk registration
Login flow works with ADMIN/vit2025 credentials
Staff Portal loads and displays patient list and queue
Analytics page loads with all KPIs and charts
Report controls and date filters functional
Backend API endpoints (20/21 tests passed - 95.2% success rate)
